newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Yeltsin stays in country residence to end of week.
newsitem.headline: Yeltsin stays in country residence to end of week.

text.p: President Boris Yeltsin, recuperating from heart surgery, will stay in the Rus country residence until around the end of this week, his spokesman was quoted as saying on Sunday.
Itar-Tass news agency quoted Sergei Yastrzhembsky as saying Yeltsin, who underwent a quintuple bypass on November 5, planned no working meetings.
This was both because Rus was 100 km (60 miles) from Moscow and because the 65-year-old president needed to make the most of his rest in the final stage of his recovery.
Yastrzhembksy said Yeltsin was devoting increasing attention to working on official papers. Russian officials say Yeltsin could make a trial visit to the Kremlin by December 25.
